meanings.definition: Of the poorest quality or lowest standard
meanings.sent1: The dreckiest movie I've ever seen was so boring.
meanings.sent2: This shirt is the dreckiest one in my closet.
meanings.sent3: The dreckiest sandwich I've ever had was like eating cardboard.
meanings.sent4: Her dreckiest painting looked like a child's scribble.
meanings.sent5: The dreckiest car in the lot barely ran and was covered in rust.

meanings.sent1: He threw away the dreckiest of the old magazines.
meanings.sent2: The broken toy was the dreckiest thing in the toy box.
meanings.sent3: The dreckiest of the tools in the shed couldn't even be fixed.
meanings.sent4: She considered the dreckiest of the jewelry to be beyond repair.
meanings.sent5: Among all the items, the dreckiest was the old, torn book with missing pages.
